QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Prothrombin time (PT)
QAPair.Answer: Prothrombin time (PT) is a blood test that measures the time it takes for the liquid portion (plasma) of your blood to clot. It measures the function of a part of the clotting system. A related blood test is partial thromboplastin time (PTT) , which measures the function of a different part of the clotting system.
